name: MUTE [DEMO 1.0]
description:
"How far would you go to get an own voice?"

Nobody can hear you.
    Everyone looks at you with compassion and gives you helpless looks.
           Some even prefer to look away.

Why? You are mute and you´re living in a world of progress and communication.
       You do not know how to communicate clearly.
              How you can participate in life around you.
                   In this huge city that is your home.

But there is someone there.
     Four people who understand you.
             Who can hear your thoughts. Your inner voice.

They were with you since you were a child.
    They always gave you courage. 
          But there was a time when they were not with you.

During this time, you have become increasingly isolated and lost your courage.
      Now you live in your own world, far away from life on your doorstep.

But one day you hear four familiar voices.
     And they found something that could help you ...

Do you dare to go to your limits to finally be able to speak? To have an own voice?

- Submission for the IGMC 2018 Jam -
Engine: RpgMaker MV
Genre: Fantasy/RPG

~ Features ~ 
- playable with mouse, gamepad and keyboeard
- Achievments (2 achievments are already included in the demo!)

- 2 different endings
